soy-sauce-chicken.name: Soy Sauce Chicken
soy-sauce-chicken.expect: A savory and aromatic soy-sauce braised chicken...
soy-sauce-chicken.kit: Chicken thighs, soy sauce, ginger, garlic, scallions, sesame oil, rice, mixed veggies
